title: Obama plays with baby - CNNPolitics.com
text:
CNN.com
Obama bonds with baby By Deena Zaru , CNN Updated 1908 GMT (0208 HKT) June 5, 2015 President Barack Obama plays with Ella Harper Rhodes, daughter of Ben Rhodes, Deputy National Security Advisor for Strategic Communications, during an Oval Office drop by, June 4, 2015. Washington (CNN) Being the President of the United States often comes with mounting stress and a mounting list of opponents. However, there is one demographic with which President Obama seems to not be having much trouble: children. White House Photographer Pete Souza shared a photo on Instagram Thursday of the President in the Oval Office, playing with Ella Harper Rhodes, daughter of Deputy National Security Adviser Ben Rhodes. A photo posted by Pete Souza (@petesouza) on Jun 4, 2015 at 3:47pm PDT
